start_boss.text: Big one's out. Let's see what it's got.
That one's gonna take some elbow grease.
Big fish, big payday. I ain't turnin' back.
Well now. This is a fine way to test one's faith..

retreat.text: Ludd teaches us to endure, not to perish.

out_of_missiles.text: That's all she wrote for the launchers.
Dry on missiles - not done yet.
No more tricks left in the tubes.
Missiles are done. Back to the gospel of kinetic persuasion.

engaged.text: They won't like how this ends.

need_help.text: Blessed be the reinforcements- now send me some!
Bit of a pickle here, commander.
Could use a hand if you're feelin' generous, $commanderName.
Don't leave me hangin' out here.

pursuing.text: Not lettin' this one slip off.

running.text: Backin' off before I get boxed in.
Time to move before I get boxed in.
Don't much fancy stayin' put right now.
Tide's turnin'. Ain't worth dyin' here.

hull_50.text: Uh..are they suppose to be this good?
Come on baby, stay with me just a bit more.

hull_30.text: Gonna need a tow if this keeps up.
Hope you're ready to fish me out after.

overload.text: Too hot, too fast- damn it!

death.text: Guess I'm floatin' for a bit.

victory.text: That's one less ship drownin' the stars in sin.

victory_boss.text: That one's not gettin' back up.
They'll be tellin' stories 'bout that one.
That hull'll haunt salvage crews for cycles.
Even Moloch'd flinch at that wreck.
